title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.4 - Mooring facilities, ingress and egress
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.4 - Mooring facilities, ingress and egress

State Regulations

Officers, crew members, stevedores and other persons
doing business in connection with watercraft moored at a terminal or its cargo
may use the mooring facilities and driveways as a means of access between the
watercraft and the public streets only in accordance with the rules prescribed
by the Port Authority, except as provided in existing leases. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
